document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">came </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">last </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">prompter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Death </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">occupied </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">House </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">pallid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Furniture </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">arranged </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">metallic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Peace </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">faithful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Frost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">kept </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Date </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Love </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">punctual </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">been </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">Delight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">aggrandized </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Gate </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">blocked </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">coming </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: It came at last but prompter death
